title: How to look at your handwriting - Quora

response.answer_text: I’ll show you an example of my handwriting, as I politely requested that my neighbor, Bill, who I’ve [still] never met, please leave me alone, and get his vehicles away from my house. He didn’t comply, until the sheriff’s deputies intervened for me, over and over. It took thirty-five days to get my home back all to myself, and two of my cars got smashed up, on purpose, in the interim. Because of him. They still are. My blue convertible, and my burgundy Thunderbird. Next-door neighbors!
